charges.charge_disposition: REVOCATION: Supervised Release: REVOKED. Imprisonment: TIME SERVED with no supervision to follow. PRIOR JUDGMENT: AMENDED JUDGMENT: IMPRISONMENT FOR 120 MONTHS WITH 1 YEAR SUPERVISED RELEASE. REDUCED SENTENCE: 120 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT. SUPERVISED RELEASE for a term of 3 years. PRIOR SENTENCE:188 months. The Court recommends that the defendant be designated to a facility at/or near Miami, Florida to be close to family. Additionally, the Court recommends that the defendant participate in a drug treatment program. Supervised Release for a term of 5 years. The defendant shall not possess a firearm. (See judgment for conditions of supervision). Assessment of #100.00 to be paid in a lump sum immediately.
